hero.name: Veda Bezaleel
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.headline: Building Digital Experiences That Matter
hero.subheadline: I create modern, scalable web applications with clean code and intuitive user experiences. Let's bring your ideas to life.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate developer with a love for creating innovative solutions

skills.title: Pixel Perfectionist
skills.description: Focused on detailed slicing of design components with minimal tolerance to achieve pixel-perfect, responsive interfaces that mirror Figma designs.

skills.title: Logic Architect
skills.description: Designs logical and optimized backend solutions to achieve peak performance under varying conditions using scalable architectures and efficient API integrations.

skills.title: Cloud Orchestrator
skills.description: Implements deployment strategies that balance high performance with cost efficiency, ensuring robust operations and smooth collaboration across tech teams.

skills.title: AI Explorer
skills.description: Curious and proactive about AI developments. I learn fast, adapt quickly, and turn new capabilities into real product features — from prototype to production.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.subtitle: A timeline of my professional growth and achievements

achievements: Converted Figma designs into responsive, pixel-perfect UI components.
Collaborated closely with backend teams to integrate new features.
Delivered a full-stack Laravel–React app end-to-end, owning database through UI.
Designed REST APIs, auth, and domain logic in Laravel; integrated third-party services.
Built a session-based login feature to improve authentication and security.
Optimized backend processes with Next.js to improve system performance.
Co-designed and ran database scaling with data engineers.
Guided schema, indexing, and query design to balance performance, reliability, and cost.
Implemented observability and tuning—profiling, pooling, caching—to keep latency stable at scale.
Aligned team and stakeholders to turn requirements into a prioritized roadmap and sprints.
Implemented automated PDF invoice generation to streamline transactions.
Integrate new features with firestore db.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and projects

projects.title: Sparka Smart Parking System
projects.description: Built a Smart Parking System with role-based interfaces for users, admins, and operators. Frontend in Next.js, backend in Lumen PHP handling reservations and realtime updates. Deployed on GCP with Docker & Cloud Run.

projects.title: Remosto Recommendation System
projects.description: Created a responsive web platform with maps and AI-driven item recommendations using computer vision. Built RESTful API endpoints and conducted end-to-end testing with Cypress.

projects.title: LoRa Realtime Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a realtime monitoring interface for LoRa-based smart lighting at PT Global Data Inspirasi. Integrated Flask REST API with MQTT pub/sub on the Antares platform, connecting physical IoT devices to the web UI.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What clients and colleagues say about working with me

items.content: Alex delivered exceptional work on our e-commerce platform. His attention to detail and technical expertise exceeded our expectations. The project was completed on time and within budget.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.content: Working with Alex was a game-changer for our startup. He not only built our MVP but also provided valuable insights on scalability and user experience. Highly recommended!
items.author: Michael Rodriguez

items.content: Alex's full-stack expertise and problem-solving skills are outstanding. He transformed our complex requirements into an elegant, user-friendly application that our customers love.
items.author: Emily Watson

contacts.title: Let's Connect and Collaborate
contacts.subtitle: Ready to bring your ideas to life? I'd love to hear about your project and explore how we can work together to create something amazing.
